US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: Share of people who completed the initial COVID-19 vaccination protocol
column3: Share of the total population who received all doses prescribed by the initial vaccination protocol.
column7: people_fully_vaccinated_per_hundred

US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: Number of people who received at least one dose of COVID-19 vaccine
column3: Total number of people who received at least one vaccine dose. This may not equal the number of people that are fully vaccinated if the vaccine requires two doses.
column7: people_vaccinated

US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: Number of people who completed the initial COVID-19 vaccination protocol
column3: Total number of people who received all doses prescribed by the initial vaccination protocol.
column7: people_fully_vaccinated

US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: Number of people vaccinated against COVID-19
column7: people_fully_vaccinated people_partly_vaccinated

US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: Share of people who received at least one dose of COVID-19 vaccine
column3: Share of the total population that received at least one vaccine dose. This may not equal the share that are fully vaccinated if the vaccine requires two doses.
column7: people_vaccinated_per_hundred

US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: Share of people vaccinated against COVID-19
column7: people_fully_vaccinated_per_hundred people_partly_vaccinated_per_hundred

column3: For vaccines that require multiple doses, each individual dose is counted. As the same person may receive more than one dose, the number of doses can be higher than the number of people in the population.
column7: total_vaccinations

US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: COVID-19 vaccine doses administered per 100 people
column3: For vaccines that require multiple doses, each individual dose is counted. As the same person may receive more than one dose, the number of doses per 100 people can be higher than 100.
column7: total_vaccinations_per_hundred

US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: Daily COVID-19 vaccine doses administered
column3: For vaccines that require multiple doses, each individual dose is counted.
column7: daily_vaccinations_raw

US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: Daily COVID-19 vaccine doses administered per 100 people
column3: For vaccines that require multiple doses, each individual dose is counted.
column7: daily_vaccinations_raw_per_hundred

US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: Daily COVID-19 vaccine doses administered
column3: Shown is the rolling 7-day average. For vaccines that require multiple doses, each individual dose is counted.
column7: daily_vaccinations

US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: Daily COVID-19 vaccine doses administered per 100 people
column3: Shown is the rolling 7-day average per 100 people in the total population. For vaccines that require multiple doses, each individual dose is counted.
column7: daily_vaccinations_per_hundred

US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: Total COVID-19 vaccine doses distributed
column3: Cumulative counts of COVID-19 vaccine doses reported to Operation Warp Speed as delivered.
column7: total_distributed

US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: Total COVID-19 vaccine doses distributed per 100 people
column3: Cumulative counts of COVID-19 vaccine doses reported to Operation Warp Speed as delivered per 100 people in the total population.
column7: distributed_per_hundred

column3: Total number of vaccine booster doses administered. Booster doses are doses administered beyond those prescribed by the original vaccination protocol.
column7: total_boosters

US COVID-19 Vaccination: US: COVID-19 vaccine boosters administered per 100 people
column3: Total number of vaccine booster doses administered, divided by the total population of the state. As the same person may receive more than one booster the number of doses per 100 people can be higher than 100.
column7: total_boosters_per_hundred
